titleStmt.title: Two letters one from John Audland, a Quaker, to William Prynne, the other, William Prynnes answer / by the author of Hudibras.
titleStmt.author: Butler, Samuel, 1612-1680.

notesStmt.note: A satire on Audland and Prynne.
Written by S. Butler. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
